page.title: 12A QUARRINGTON FAMILY
page.content: The Kinnersley{family}rise at 7.45, wash, dress, have breakfast and prepare lunches for the boys, Craig, l0, and Adrian, 7. At 8.45 dad, Peter Kinnersley, travels to{Ancaster where he is a{car sales manager.}Then mum, Elaine, takes the boys to {Sleaford RC School}by car for 9.00. She then travels to{Billinghay}to teach{swimming,}returning home for dinner with dad from 1.00 to 2.00. Mum fetches Adrian from school at 3.00 and Craig at 3.30. At 4.l0 Grandma, Mrs Tindale, arrives for tea. The boys watch{television,}have dinner and go to{gymnastics}at{Sleaford High {School.}Mum teaches the class until 7.00. Dad has tea at 7.l0. The boys have supper, read, bath, say prayers and retire at 8.l5. Mum plays netball or tennis. Dad takes grandma home. Mum and dad go to bed at ll.00.
